WITH p, u
MATCH (p)-[:HAS_IMAGE]->(img:Image)
MATCH (p)-[:HAS_TAG]->(tag:Tag)
RETURN 
    p.createdAt AS post_createdAt,
    p.id AS post_id,
    img.url AS image_url,
    tag.url AS tag_url,
    p<-[:HAS_RELATION]-(r:Relation)-[:HAS_RELATION]-(u)
    WHERE r.createdAt IS NOT NULL
    RETURN
    p.createdAt AS post_createdAt,
    p.id AS post_id,
    img.url AS image_url,
    tag.url AS tag_url,
    r.createdAt AS relation_createdAt,
    tag.name AS tag_name,
    p.language AS post_language,
    u.browser AS user_browser,
    p.length AS post_length,
    u.ip AS user_ip
ORDER BY p.createdAt DESC
LIMIT 12;

查找名为Abdoulatifou的人喜欢的评论，返回该人的语言、浏览器、电子邮件、性别、生日以及评论的id、内容、评论的创建日期和喜欢关系的创建日期，跳过前12条记录，限制返回17条记录。
output:
MATCH (p:Person {name: "Abdoulatifou"})-[:LIKES]->(c:Comment)
WITH p, c
RETURN p.language, p.browser, p.email, p.gender, p.birthday,
       c.id, c.content, c.creationDate, c.likes.creationDate
LIMIT 17 SKIP 12

instruction:
请将以下自然语言转换为图数据库的Cypher查询:
查找名为Mohamed的人喜欢的评论的长度、IP地址、id，以及该人的IP地址、生日、姓氏、语言、名字和id，还有评论的内容。
output:
MATCH (p:Person {name: "Mohamed"})-[:LIKES]->(c:Comment)
WITH p, c, length(c.content) AS comment_length, c.ip_address AS comment_ip
RETURN 
    p.ip_address AS person_ip,
    p.birthday AS person_birthday,
    p.lastname AS person_lastname,
    p.language AS person_language,
    p.name AS person_name,
    p.id AS person_id,
    c.id AS comment_id,
    comment_length,
    comment_ip,
    c.content AS comment_content

instruction:
请将以下自然语言转换为图数据库的Cypher查询:
查找名为Jan的人的生日，以及他喜欢的评论所使用的浏览器、评论内容、评论长度、评论创建日期和Jan的创建日期
output:
MATCH (p:Person {name: "Jan"})-[:HAS_BIRTHDAY]->(b:Birthday)
WITH p, b
MATCH (p)-[:WROTE]->(c:Comment)
WITH p, b, c
MATCH (c)-[:USED_BROWSER]->(browser:Browser)
RETURN p.name, b.date, c.content, browser.name, c.length, c.created_at, p.created_at

instruction:

       b.name as browser_name, g.year as graduation_year,
